name: The Little Dragonman
description:
Play as a little dragonman who has lost his family and wants to return home. Go through and defeat all the enemies that stand in the way and find your way home.

Keyboard Controls

- A to move left.

- D to move right.

- ESPACE to jump.

- E to attack.

- ALT to shoot.

- G to roll.

- 2 to fly.
